text: The Pontiac Trans Sport is a minivan made by General Motors in 1989. Its 1st generation rebadged minivans were the Chevrolet Lumina APV and The Oldsmobile Silhouette. Its second generation is based on the Chevrolet Venture, Vauxhall Sintra or Opel Sintra Category:Pontiac automobiles Category:Minivans
title: Pontiac Trans Sport
